title: SGX Announces a New Corporate Structure: Can the Bourse Operator Continue Growing its Profits and Dividends? - The Smart Investor
summary: Singapore Exchange Limited (SGX) reported strong fiscal 2023 earnings, with revenue increasing by 8.5% to S$687.9 million and net profit rising by 26.5% to S$570.9 million. The bourse operator is restructuring to enhance its multi-asset offerings and has launched several new products, including Singapore Depository Receipts and various Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs). SGX has shown growth in its commodities and foreign exchange divisions, with significant year-on-year volume increases. Investors can expect further potential increases in dividends due to the company’s positive outlook and intentions for earnings growth.

title: India & China Emerging As Gamechangers Of Green Industrial Era - Indian PSU
summary: The article discusses the global competition among major economies, particularly India, China, the EU, and the US, in the emerging green industrial era focused on zero-carbon technologies. It highlights China's leading role in renewable energy production and supply chains, while the EU swiftly decarbonizes its economy. The US is recognized for its innovation through investment and legislation such as the Inflation Reduction Act, which seeks to challenge existing leadership. Japan and India are also mentioned, with the latter needing financial support to enhance its net-zero ambitions.

title: PUMA India Sets New Sustainability Standard in Retail with IoT-Enabled Clean Air Initiative - Indian Retailer
summary: HanesBrands has agreed to sell its global Champion business to Authentic Brands Group for up to $1.5 billion. The transaction is intended to optimize HanesBrands' focus on its innerwear category and improve financial performance while accelerating debt reduction. HanesBrands expects to simplify its operations through the sale and plans to remove stranded costs within a year post-transaction. Closing is anticipated in the second half of 2024, with subsequent reporting changes for Champion's financial operations.
